languages.text: Осколки статуи оплавлены. Похоже, по ней прошлись серией выстрелов мультилазерной турели, какими оснащают десантные шаттлы.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Выглядит что статуя была разрушена выстрелом мощного орудия из шаттла

languages.text: The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret — the type found on landing-force shuttles.
languages.original_text: Осколки статуи оплавлены. Похоже, по ней прошлись серией выстрелов мультилазерной турели, какими оснащают десантные шаттлы.

traits.locale_text: The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.
Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret — the type found on landing-force shuttles.

languages.text: Die Teile sind an den Rändern geschmolzen. Die Statue wurde vermutlich von einem Lasergeschütz getroffen ... einem Laser, wie ihn Landungstrupp-Shuttles benutzen.
languages.original_text: The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret — the type found on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Die Teile sind an den Rändern geschmolzen. Die Statue wurde vermutlich von einem Lasergeschütz getroffen ... einem Laser, wie ihn Landungstrupp-Shuttles benutzen.

languages.text: Les bords des morceaux sont fondus, preuve que la statue a probablement été détruite par les tirs d'une tourelle multi-laser, comme celles montées sur les navettes de débarquement.
languages.original_text: The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret — the type found on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Les bords des morceaux sont fondus, preuve que la statue a probablement été détruite par les tirs d'une tourelle multi-laser, comme celles montées sur les navettes de débarquement.

languages.text: 这座雕像的碎片边缘被熔化了，应该是登陆部队穿梭机上的多管激光炮塔齐射时造成的。
languages.original_text: The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret — the type found on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: 这座雕像的碎片边缘被熔化了，应该是登陆部队穿梭机上的多管激光炮塔齐射时造成的。

languages.text: 破片の端が溶けている事から判断すると、この像は上陸部隊のシャトルに搭載されているタイプのマルチレーザー砲塔が放った炎で破壊されたと考えられる。
languages.original_text: The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret — the type found on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: 破片の縁は溶けている。この像はおそらく、強襲部隊のシャトルに搭載されているマルチレーザーターレットからの集中砲火によって破壊されたのだろう。

languages.text: Las piezas están fundidas en los bordes. Es probable que la estatua fuera objetivo de una torreta multiláser como las que usan las lanzaderas de las fuerzas de aterrizaje.
languages.original_text: The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret — the type found on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Las piezas están fundidas en los bordes. Es probable que la estatua fuera objetivo de una torreta multiláser como las que usan las lanzaderas de las fuerzas de aterrizaje.

languages.text: Parçaların kenarları erimiş. Heykel, muhtemelen çok lazerli bir taretin yaylım ateşiyle paramparça edilmiş. Bu taretler çıkarma kuvveti mekiklerinde bulunur.
languages.original_text: The pieces are molten at the edges. The statue was likely blasted by a barrage from a multi-laser turret — the type found on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Parçaların kenarları erimiş. Heykel, muhtemelen çok lazerli bir taretin yaylım ateşiyle paramparça edilmiş. Bu taretler çıkarma kuvveti mekiklerinde bulunur.
